message.content:
We begin by “opening” the books as of 31‑Dec‑2023. Notice that one of the three “Initial” rows is for a “Bank deposit” – it records 5,000,000.00 in that account. (The “Cash deposit” and “Fixed Assets” lines do not belong in the bank deposit account.) 

Then we look among all subsequent transactions for any entry in which money is paid “by bank transfer” (this is the only indicator that a payment came out of the bank account). (Sales made on “Account Receivable” and expenses paid in cash do not affect the bank‐deposit balance.) In our table the following rows use a “Bank Transfer” as payment method (and are marked “Paid”), which we interpret as having reduced the bank deposit:

• Row with id Purchase20231231001 is using “Account Payable” (thus no bank–transfer) so we skip it.

• Row “Purchase20231231002”: amount = 1,000.00 (payment method = Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231004”: amount = 1,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231005”: amount = 20,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231006”: amount = 10,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231010”: amount = 3,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231011”: amount = 200,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231012”: amount = 20,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231013”: amount = 10,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231015”: amount = 20,000.00 (Bank Transfer)
• Row “Purchase20231231022”: amount = 1,000.00 (Bank Transfer)

Let’s sum these outflow amounts:
  1,000 + 1,000 = 2,000  
  2,000 + 20,000 = 22,000  
  22,000 + 10,000 = 32,000  
  32,000 + 3,000 = 35,000  
  35,000 + 200,000 = 235,000  
  235,000 + 20,000 = 255,000  
  255,000 + 10,000 = 265,000  
  265,000 + 20,000 = 285,000  
  285,000 + 1,000 = 286,000

So the total reduction from the bank‐deposit is 286,000.

Subtract this from the opening bank deposit (5,000,000):
  5,000,000 – 286,000 = 4,714,000

Thus, the bank deposit account started at 5,000,000.00 and ended at 4,714,000.00.

We now report the final answer in the required JSON format:

--------------------------------------------------

{"solution": {'Bank Deposits Initial Value': '5000000.00', 'Bank Deposits End Value': '4714000.00'} }
